name: Lake
description: A peaceful freshwater lake surrounded by pine trees. Perfect for beginners to learn the basics of fishing. The calm waters are home to common fish species and some rare magical variants.

name: River
description: A flowing river with moderate currents and rocky areas. Requires more skill to navigate the moving waters. Home to migratory fish and mystical species that thrive in flowing water.

name: Ocean
description: Vast saltwater expanse with unpredictable waves and strong currents. Challenging fishing conditions but rewarding catches. Large predators and electric species dominate these waters.

name: Deep Sea
description: The mysterious depths of the ocean where sunlight never reaches. Only the most experienced anglers dare venture here. Ancient creatures and legendary beasts lurk in the abyssal darkness.
